reviewText: The visuals aren't great (this is pre-HD), but the narration is spectacular-- every sentence is crisp, clear, and essential. I felt like I learned something new and remarkable every minute or two. Not to overemphasize, but the writing is truly terrific. Bona fide experts may find this too basic, but I would compare it to a college Art History 101 course-- one that's so well done it's also comprehensible to high school and even bright middle school children.
